content.html: This week did not show us weakness in Log4J, Java, or open source. It showed us their relevance and resilience. Myü§òüèªto the folks keeping us safe with timely workarounds, fixes, and communications. This was a masterclass in global incident response.
content.value:
This week did not show us weakness in Log4J, Java, or open source.

It showed us their relevance and resilience.

Myü§òüèªto the folks keeping us safe with timely workarounds, fixes, and communications. This was a masterclass in global incident response.
